description: This header file 'map_80211.h' declares functions related to 802.11 association body parsing and maximum PHY rate calculation within the RdkEasyMeshController component of the project. It provides function prototypes and includes relevant data model definitions.

methods.name: map_80211_parse_assoc_body
methods.description: Parses the association or reassociation body to extract station capabilities, determine if the station operates on 2G, and validate against a specific SSID.

methods.name: map_get_max_phy_rate
methods.description: Calculates the maximum physical rate in kbps based on station capabilities.
